vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.play (patch_10.sol#78-98):
	External calls:
	- loseWager(wagerAmount / 2) (patch_10.sol#92)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payout(msg.sender,wagerAmount) (patch_10.sol#90)
	- loseWager(wagerAmount / 2) (patch_10.sol#92)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- randomSeed (patch_10.sol#94)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_10.sol#78-98) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_10.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_10.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_10.sol#112-116):
	-require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(),Donation failed) patch_10.sol#114

	-require(bool,string)(whale.call.value(amount)(),Donation failed) patch_10.sol#120
